command: [withheld due to safety: would generate and transmit a Wake-on-LAN magic packet via scapy: 6 bytes of 0xFF followed by 16 repetitions of the target MAC, UDP dport 9]
explanation: High-level concept: emit a standards-compliant WoL magic packet to trigger device wake or serve as a covert signal. The packet must be 6x 0xFF followed by 16x target MAC and can be broadcast to UDP/9. Detection: monitor for unusual WoL frames sent by unexpected hosts, alert on broadcast UDP/9 traffic with WoL payloads, and restrict who can send WoL in network policy.
rationale_steps: Construct the WoL payload: FF FF FF FF FF FF + (MAC repeated 16 times).
Send as Ethernet broadcast with UDP/9 using scapy (requires root to transmit raw frames).
Detection: tcpdump filter udp port 9; IDS signatures for WoL payload; inventory which hosts are allowed to originate WoL.
